name: Christmas at Techniquest

location.address: Stuart Street, Cardiff Bay, Cardiff CF10 5BW

dates.openingHours: Check website for seasonal hours (extended during school holidays)

description: Techniquest brings festive science to Cardiff Bay with special Christmas-themed activities and shows during the holiday season. Wales' leading science discovery centre offers over 100 hands-on exhibits that spark curiosity in visitors of all ages, with seasonal programming adding extra sparkle during winter. Live science shows explore the fascinating chemistry of Christmas, from the science of snow to explosive demonstrations that captivate young audiences. The state-of-the-art planetarium offers star tours perfect for winter nights, while hands-on Lab workshops let families create their own festive experiments. Located in the heart of Cardiff Bay, Techniquest provides the perfect wet-weather destination for families seeking educational entertainment during the Christmas holidays.
highlights: Indoor venue - perfect for any weather
